Body: Over the last day my phone has recorded me being in places 10s of kilometers away from where I actually was.I noticed because I use an app to monitor my walking/cycling for the day. I verified on Google's location history page that it believes I was at these locations.Is this an indication that my device is faulty or compromised or possibly the result of bad software? Or is this just a thing that "happens"? Any fix?
Title: My map history is wrong. Is my device damaged or compromised?
